title: Episode 201: Inbox Zero In The Bedroom with Elizabeth Spiridakis Olson
itunes:title: Episode 201: Inbox Zero In The Bedroom with Elizabeth Spiridakis Olson
description:
Kate and Doree wonder when a good self-care practice like reading in bed becomes too much of a good thing. Then, friend of the pod Elizabeth Spiridakis Olson joins them to talk about her first friend date with Doree, how her fashion blog taught her she enjoys being influential without being an influencer, and what she does to balance being a maximalist in a minimalist world.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
